elements.label: Mr. Agdistis
elements.description: The tall and tragic stage director of the Ecdysis Club.

elements.label: Mr. Agdistis [hard to meet]

elements.label: An Unmarked Grave
elements.description: What remains of the dancer slowly sinks down into the soggy soil.

elements.label: An Unmarked Grave [away]
elements.description: What remains of the dancer slowly sinks down into the soggy soil.

elements.label: The Ecdysis Club
elements.description: A cabaret with an occult reputation. The club has several layers of stages, each with more exclusive than the previous, and each one more intimate. I can enter on Agdistis' invitation, but I am not permitted true access until I have proven myself in an audition.

slots.label: Song
slots.description: I should begin my performance, by declaring my intentions, my method, my staging.

slots.label: Story to trade
slots.description: The story I'm willing to share in order to get them to share theirs.
